dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents shale plays in the United States and Canada. Data includes shale play name and location by country. This layer is from Winter Quarter 2016. This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing shale plays data in the United States and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. Hart Energy Publishing.(2016). Shale Plays, North America, Winter 2016. Hart Energy Publishing. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/jb029wd1937 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
